courseSectionInformation: 2 undergraduate hours. 2 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CI 420; admission to the Early Childhood Teacher Education Program.
description: Course emphasizes the place of social studies in early childhood education program (preschool - grade 3). Focuses on several areas of knowledge related to the social life of the community as it is concerned with young children; (1) knowledge from the social sciences, (2) social cognition and social skills learning, and (3) ways of dealing with cultural and social diversity. 2 undergraduate hours. 2 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CI 420; admission to the Early Childhood Teacher Education Program.
label: Social Stud Early Childhood Ed
sectionCappArea: Restricted to Admitted Teacher Ed Student students.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Special Education or Early Childhood Education or Early Childhood Education major(s) or minor(s).
